calculateProjectedRewards(uint256,uint25.details: function to calculate projected rewards given a specific APR and duration

calculateTimeBasedReward(uint256,uint256.details: Helper function to calculate rewards on claiming, staking and unstaking

calculateTimeWeightedAPR(uint256,uint256.details: function to calculate time weighted APR

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateCurrentAPR().notice: this function get called upon calling stake and unstake functions

calculateTimeBasedReward(uint256,uint256.notice: this function get called everytime the reward get accumulated

calculateTimeWeightedAPR(uint256,uint256.notice: this function get called when calculating rewardsthe APR will be calculated based on the time range of the staking durationFor example, if the staking APR is 100% for the first 10 days  and 50% for the next 10 days,  the time-weighted APR will be (100 x 10 + 50 x 10) / 20 = 75(%) Assumed the user claim the rewards for q staking of 20 days duration, with 2 APR snapshots like above
